column4: guys i got Ubuntu 8.10 and i can't connect my external hard disk to it.. help plz
guys i got Ubuntu 8.10 and i can't connect my external hard disk to it.. help plz
can't connect my external hard disk.. unless you give us more info I'll have to go with 1. make sure you have a suitable cable
ok, try to write as much information you can, on one line, what kind of hard drive, file system, how you determine that it doesn't work, what you've tried etc... remember.. one line
